V03vinsutru:vin_1.2_0_0: / sarvasmin* sannipatite saṃghe kṛtedaṃ veṣaṃ nipatya pragṛhītāñjalim utkuṭusthaṃ vṛddhāntaṃ yācivantaṃ trir jñapticaturthena
V03vinsutru:vin_1.2_0_1: karmaṇā saha pravrajyopasaṃpadāv upanayeyur iti purākalpaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.9_0: / kañcit pariśuddhya tīti pṛṣṭvā śuddham ā[1b3]rocayet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.36_0: / nānuktvā sahitam arthahetor nāma gṛhnāmīty upādhyāyanāma gṛhnīyāt*
V03vinsutru:vin_1.38_0: / upādhyāyatāyām unmukhībhūtaḥ karmakārakam adhīcched raho nuśāsakañ ca bhikṣuṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.41_0: / pātrañ copadarśya monam a[2a1] / /dhikaṃ pāṇḍapetīti saṃghe /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.43_0: / apakasite ka ity ākhyāpya raha nuśāsakam utsāhya karmakārakaḥ saṃghaṃ yenam anujñā..payet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.45_0: / tiṣṭha mā śabditā gamiṣyasīty enam uktvā samanuśiṣṭa iti saṃghāya pariśuddhiṃ nivedya kim āgacchatv ity āgamanaṃ pṛcchet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.55_0: / hemantito graismiko vārṣiko mitavārṣik. dīrghavārṣika iti /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.63_0: / sa[m*]pannatāṃ samyagtayā ca prepsitasyotgrāhya śīlasāmānyagatatārāgaṇe niyuñjīt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.73_0_0: / ekānnaṃ pañcāśavyāmaparyantād vihārato gamanaṃ [2a5] pātracīvarakarmaṇo glānopasthāne kokṛtyaprativinodane pāpakadṛṣṭigatapratiniḥsarge
V03vinsutru:vin_1.73_0_1: tīvram autsugyam āpadyetāhovatāhaṃ kuryāṃ kārayeyam veti /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.74_0: / praṇidhātukāme saṃghe ho vata saṃgho syedaṃ praṇidhikarma na kuryād iti /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.76_0: / parivāsamūlaparivāsamānāpy amūlamānāpy āvartaṇārthini niḥśraye ho vata saṃghasya parivāsādi catuṣkaṃ dadyād ā[2a6]bṛhet iti /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.77_0: / so py etad asmai kuryād utsṛjyāvalokanaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.103_0: / māsi tīrthya iti pravrajyārtham upasaṃkrāntaṃ pṛcched upasampādakāś ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.104_0: / nānārādhitacittam utsṛjya śākyam āgneyañ ca jaṭilaṃ tīrthyaṃ pravrajayeyur upasaṃpādayeyur vā kṛte tattīrthyānārādhitāditīrthyānta[ra]varjam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.105_0: / ratnānāṃ varṇasya [2b4] tīrthyānām avarṇasya bhūtasyoktāv akupyatvamārādhitacittatā /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.106_0: / tadartham atadvan tam enaṃ kṛtopāsakatāntaṃ caturo māsān parivāsayed* saṃgho datvā parivāsaṃ karmaṇā /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.111_0: / nonam asamarthaṃ kākoḍḍāyane samartham vā [2b5] saptavarṣaṃ pravrajayeyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.113_0: / aruciś ced anekadhyaṃ pravrajyāyāṃ pravrajyātiriktam upasam*pādayet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.117_0: / vyasiste kasyacit kicid deyam alpaṃ vā prabhūtam vā /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.120_0: / nānārocitaṃ dūradeśam apy enaṃ saṃghe pravrājayet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.122_0: / kṛtānujñāte so mātapitṛbhyām ante muktvā dūradeśakaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.124_0: / mā te glānyaṃ kañcid astīti vā /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.133_1: steyasaṃvāsikaḥ / jānato kṛtatāṃ vidher upasaṃpado prarūḍhatām vā dvitīyāyāṃ saṃghe na sā[3a2]rdhaṃ karmaṇaḥ pratyanubhūtatāyāṃ tatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.135_0: / samāttedaṃ pravrajyasya taddṛṣṭer nikṣipyedaṃ cīvaran tena dhvajena tatrāruṇodgamane tattvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.143_0: / caturṇāṃ [3a3] pārajikānām anyat tam āpattim āpannaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.144_0: / bhyupapataḥ syāc cet sāmagrī punaḥ praṇidhānaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.145_3: / khañjaḥ kāṇḍarikaḥ kāṇaḥ kuṇiḥ kubjo tha vā manaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.145_5: / strīchinnā bhārachinnā mārgachinnāś ca ye narāḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.145_6: / tālam uktā kandalichinnāḥ evaṃrūpa hi puruṣāḥ pratikṣiptā maharṣiṇā /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.150_2: / avadātakeśāś ca ye narā nāgakeśā akeśakā /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.150_15: / atigrīvā agrīvāś ca skandhākṣā api kubjakāḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.150_18: / caturbhiś ca chavivarṇaiḥ khelā vikaṭakās tathā /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.155_0: / na dvyaṅgulād ūrdham āraṇyakaḥ keṣān dhārayet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.161_0: / kārayeta vraṇanimittam arūṭṭāv anyathā vijñān* sthavirasthavirān avalokya /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.163_0: / nānyatra kāye .. kṣurabhāram vā nakhachedaṃ bhajeta vāsimukhaṃ vā /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.165_0: / bhajeta lekhaṃ malāpakṛṣṭyai na cīvareṇa keśaśmaśrv avatārayet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.170_0: / avatārayeta prasādādau jīrṇo glāno vātātapavarṣeṣu ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.175_0: / saṃrajyamānām adhiṣṭhātrī samanuśiṣyān* [3b5] smṛtim upasthāpaya kim asmin* pūtikaḍevare sāram astīti /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.178_0: / pañcāṅgikam vā śaucaṃ na nagnaḥ snāyāt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.179_0: / na bhikṣuṇī puruṣatīrthe na strītīrthe cūrṇena /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.189_0: / patrāṇy abhāve dattvo pūrataḥ pṛṣṭhataś ca pratigupte pradeśe snānaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.200_0: / na kiñcit kenacid āmuṣṭi celavarter bhikṣuṇy utgharṣet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.203_0: / abhāve muhurtam u[[t*]]kuṭukena sthitvā snātraśāṭakena pocchanaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.219_0: / tṛṇo bhūmer āstaraṇamātrair autpattikenārdratvena temanena vā /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.232_0: / madhyapātena pratyupatiṣṭhamānam ajñātam atraitgato nirjñānārthaṃ pṛcchet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.241_0: / sarvatraiṣa bhāṇḍe vidhiḥ sarvam upakaraṃ suguptakelā[y]itaṃ kuryāt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.275_0: / pātranirmādanādi yatra pradeśe vihāre kuryāt tasyā mārjanam udakena pralepanam vā /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.278_0: / na vidyate ratnārthatāyāṃ pralipter ākārasya niyamaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.282_0: / śeṣeṇordhabhāgāntānantarād aṅguṣṭhodarāt pakvatanḍulaprasthasyordhaṃ vā tad dvayāṃ māgadhakasyodvāhi sasūpasavyañjanasyaitan nyāyyaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.293_0: / notthitaḥ pātraṃ karṣet prakṣipec choṣayed vā /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.320_0: / na tulyāvalambānām āsv ālayanakānāṃ niveśam upayuṃjīta /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.336_0: / ghṛṣṭis tailena guḍamṛdamṛnma[5a5]yasya bhujyamā[[na]]tve pākyatvaṃ māsaṣaṭkānte /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.338_0: / varṣāś cetad virūkṣaṇe mrakṣitatvena kāryāntarāle sya saṃyojyatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.354_0: / sāmantakasya prāṇa[5b1]kānām anukampayā sammārjanaṃ sekaś ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.355_0: / prarohasya parivyañjanam ajñāto varṣāgrasyopasaṃpadyaṅgīkaraṇaṃ vyājenāsya pratyavekṣaṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.359_0: / darśanopavicāra enam avakāśane sthāpayeyuḥ gaṇābhimukhaṃ vragṛhītāñjaliṃ* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.369_0: / [5b3] viśramyākantuko dvitīye tritīye vāhni niḥśrayaṃ gṛhṇīt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.378_0: / tatt[ai]vopādhyāy[e] niḥśritatvaṃ tasmād agrahaṇam asya tatra /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.389_0: / anālāpo navavāda upasthānadharmāmiṣair asaṃbhogaḥ prārabdhakuśalapakṣasamucchedo niḥśrayapratipraśrambhaṇañ ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.419_0: / na tīkṣṇena dantaṃ jihvāṃ karṇañ cotghṛṣet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.422_0: / nāprakṣālya digdhaṃ mukhamalena pradeśam a[6a3]vaguṇṭhya vā pāṃśunā dantajihvayoḥ yavanaṃ chorayet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.438_0: / sāhyaṃ ced abhirucitaṃ tenaiva saha praveśaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.461_0: / śanaiḥ saṃ[6b1]prajānan* praviś[e]n niṣkrāmec cāsaṃgharṣayaṃ dvāraśākhe /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.474_0: / avṛddhau kuśale nānyatra tat(kara)kare samarpa[6b2]ṇāṃ yācet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.482_0: / [6b3] sā hy aśaktau niḥśritaṃ yena pravṛttiḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.493_0: / deyatvam ā[bhy]ām āttasya tenāmṛtyau sati vibhave /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.499_0: / sāṃghikād enam asau māraṇāśaṃkāyāṃ śayanāsanād utthāpya [6b5] pautgalike niveśayeta /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.509_0: / drutaś cet* syād āgamaya yāvat sthavirāgaccha[6b6]tītenaṃ brūyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.510_0: / pāṇyudakadāne ca gatatve bhyavahārāyāsti cet* kālaḥ -
V03vinsutru:vin_1.513_0: / duḥprāvritatve durnivastatāyāṃ vā sauṣṭhavārtham anayor nimittam asmai kurvīt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.516_0: / yatreṣām vihārāraṇyayor vṛttis tat vṛttaṃ grāhayen niyuñjī /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.518_0: / gamiko diksārthāvāsaśayanāsanaṃ sahāyakāBś ca glānyena pahāyitvena tolayitvā prakrāmet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.519_0: / sarva paścāt mā kasyacit kiñcit pramuṣitam ity apetya dūram utsārayet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.528_0: / akaraṇe niṣṭau vā dharmyām ebhyaḥ kathaṃ kṛtvedam asmākaṃ saṃvidyata iti brūyāt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.548_0: / gṛhī cet* dharmyām asmai kathaṃ kuryāt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.549_0: / [7a5] anāgacchaty atra grāmāntikas saṃrañjanīyaṃ yathāśakti pravartayet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.552_0: / upagacched vilomāṃ parijanakriyāṃ na cet svaparopaghātāya /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.553_0: / asmai cec chaktau samucchidyaināṃ dharmyām utpādya tayā saṃjñapayeta /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.554_0: / bhaṅge praroge vā tannidānaṃ parijanasya pratisaṃska[7a6]raṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.557_0: / saṃghārāme parādhyāṃs tathā kuryād yathā svayaṃ grāhikayā grahaṇaṃ gaccheta /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.558_0: / agacchantam anārocya sahasā kasyacit kumāramitrāmatyabhaṭṭarājaputrapādamūlikān* grāhayitvā śuddhikāyāṃ parṣadi nihanyāt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.560_0: / upasaṃpady anyasya tadyācanādau karmakartuḥ [7b1] atrācayas saṃghaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.606_0: / na puruṣānukṛtitvaṃ striyā stryanukṛtitvaṃ ca puruṣasya vyañjanāntaraprakāraḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_1.619_0: / arhatvaṃ pravrajy[o]pasaṃpador upagatau puṃstvasya hīnāyāṃ yoṣiti /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.8_0: / śikṣā pratyācakṣe buddhaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ sūtraṃ vinayaṃ mātṛkām ācāryam upādhyāyam āgārikamāndhārayaśramaṇoddeśaṃ ṣaṇḍkapaṇḍakaṃ bhikṣuṇīdūṣakaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.8_1_0: steyasaṃvāsikaṃ nānāsaṃvāsikam asaṃvāsikaṃ tīrthikaṃ tīrthikāvakrāntagaṃ mātṛghātakaṃ pitṛghātakam arhaghātakaṃ saṃghabhedakaṃ
V03vinsutru:vin_2.8_1_1: [8a3] tathāgatasyāntike duṣṭacittarudhirotpādakam alaṃ me yusmadvidhaiḥ brahmacāritiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvāsena vāsabhogena ceti
V03vinsutru:vin_2.19_0: / nāgupto divā pārśvaṃ dattvā middham avakramet* /

V03vinsutru:vin_2.38_0: / aprajñāne ca sandheḥ pāṭitasya madhyāsevyasya saṃhitasya /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.49_0: / tad antyoktāvantaraṇam abhisaṃhitaṃ yenā[8b2]ntaritasya na sarveṇa sarvam asaṃbhāvanaṃ spṛṣṭeḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.61_0: / hastena hastaṃ pādena pādaṃ sandhinā sandhiṃ* vastinā vastim atyaghaṭṭane /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.70_0: / na śiṣṭair api mārgair upakramiṣya iti /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.80_0: / na yatrāṅgajātādānabhayan tāṃ nagno nadīn taret* /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.96_0: / bhavaty adhiṣṭhātur apātrāgatīye svāmitvaṃ asatvam āśayānubandhasyābhyavahārāya dāne /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.98_0: / nān abhiyoktṛsvatvam abhiprayuktānāṃ davadahādibhir ādānārthaṃ mṛgapakṣisarīsṛpā[ṇā]ṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.121_0: / nayane sā matir yāsmin yaś cādvāre /

V03vinsutru:vin_2.139_0: / tarapuṭakātikramaḥ pratisrotaḥ niṣpattiḥ svakarmāntasya tadarthaṃ vyadhiketarasyātu chandena parakarmānteṣv ambhasaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.169_0: / pṛyo sau manāpo gurur bhāvanīyaḥ pūjyaḥ praśasyaḥ pretāgrahaṇena /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.178_0: // na saparigrham anujñā[t]o nyena kalpena svīkuryāt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.183_0: / nāsatsaṃbhāvanā vā hy utsṛṣṭam ity amahājanapratyakṣam adhitiṣṭhet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.189_1: . koṣāḍukagomayamṛdāṃ yathāsukhakaraṇaṃ dhāraṇam akāmaṃ saṃbaddhenāpahṛyamānasya bhikṣoḥ śrāmaṇerasya vā /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.216_0: / vyapalāpaś ca paurvasyetareṣu dvai(n)tarasya vā pūrveṣu /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.222_0: / nihitanikṣepasya saha ced vyācanena pañcāc cātaḥ purastāc cet prayogāntaratvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.245_0: / bhrātṛvat saṃgho na tadarthaṃ hāro na svīkāraḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.250_0: / na sārdhamvihāritvaṃ antevāsitā ca hārā[10a5]nutthāne kāraṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.253_0: / samakṣānte py anābhāsitvaṃ hāraḥ vaśīkṛtatvaṃ phalāt grahe manuṣyasya /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.255_0: / na hāre yad abhisaṃhitaṃ tatsaṃbandhād anābhisaṃhita(ṃ)syāpakramaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.256_0: / sthūlaṃ yo yat gṛhṇīte tasya tad iti vyavasthāyām anyahāre /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.259_0: / grāsānupradānena nayatāśvam adhirūḍhena caivam eṣa hartavyam iti kāyaviprakāre /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.281_0: / mūṣikāpahṛtasya ca svasyādāne nyabhikṣvarthasya tad arthaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.312_0: / bhajeta dūpaś cet pratyayo vyavakīrṇatāyāṃ gṛhasthair niyuktatāyāṃ samotkṣepe /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.315_0: / na caṭitāṃ sphuṭitāṃ vā nārocya tatvam a[11a1]rpyayeta /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.324_0: / aśaktau prāpṇum āvāsaṃ samaṃ cen na kāle bhaktasya pānakasya vā /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.340_0: // sthūlaṃ mṛtyur evaṃ me bhavatīti bruvāṇasyāprati(ya)[[pa]]tā tathātvasaṃpādane mṛyatām ity anusthānaiḥ glānasya /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.345_0: / na glānāya sahasā [11a4] śastrakaṃ rajum vā dadyāt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.348_0: / prahārañ cāderapanodāya tatbhūtaḥ supratyavekṣitaṃ kṛtva le..yet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.355_0: / tatvaṃ paśyāmi mā paśyanti śabdan* śṛṇomi mama śreṇvanty upakramāmi mānupasaṃkrāmanti sārdham ālapāmi saṃlapāmi pratisaṃmode sātatyam api samāpadye mayā sārdham ity ukte /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.360_0: / nānuktis tadva tv asya tadvad dharmakatvogtiḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.361_0: / parāvadeśatvam asty asāv ity upasandhāne svasya /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.367_0: / saṃsūcanena ca na bhūtottaratve sya jātatvaṃ //
V03vinsutru:vin_2.368_0: / sthūlam arhantadantogracārhasi cīvarādikaṃ brāhma[ṇ]o vāhita[[pa]]āpadharmā ṣaḍgatasyendriyāṇi sudāntaguptarakṣitabhāvitānīty uktasya tūṣṇīmbhāvenādhivāsane /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.369_0: / yadi bhadanto rhan piṇḍa[11b2]pā[t]aṃ me gṛhāṇa praviśa gṛhām āsane niṣīda [[ha]]stodakaṃ gṛhāṇa bhojanaṃ pratigṛhāṇa sūpikaṃ bhuṃ[k]ṣvānumodasva niṣkrāmeti tadvat saṃpādane /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.404_0_0: // vinīlikādau vighaṭiti asthiśaṅkalikayoḥ śira[[ḥ]]karṇanāsasu grivānta[11b6]re pārśvapṛṣṭhakroḍavaliṣu vālāntare hastāṃsabāhuṣu
V03vinsutru:vin_2.404_0_1: bāhvantare kaṭyurupādajaṃ*ghāsu jaṃghāntare ca mocane maulaṃ /

V03vinsutru:vin_2.470_0_0: / yavān dehi dehi bhagini mahyaṃ yatte bhagini paśyāmi tad dehi yat te bhagini puratas tad dehi yat te bhagini mana-āpaṃ

V03vinsutru:vin_2.471_0: / dehi me bhagini pānīyaṃ khādyakaṃ yavāgūṃ bhojanaṃ tvam evaitad ity uktiṣu /

V03vinsutru:vin_2.486_0: / anupanatopanateḥ sampatyeḥ gṛhītadauteyasya saṃprayojyato nivedi bhavatas tatretaratadukte pūrvatra pravedane /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.499_0: / kasmād ayaṃ na pratitiṣṭhatīyaṃ na gacchati śvaśuragṛhān na nīyata iti coktīnāṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.513_0: / pratīṣṭā vaḥ yathoktakāre kāyena vā vācā vā /

V03vinsutru:vin_2.535_0: / pārājayikādhyācaraṇasya bhikṣor dhvastasyāpy anaṅgam atra pakṣataḥ svatvaṃ mṛṣāvādena kasyacid vijñaptau /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.542_0: / tathāgatasyāntike duṣṭacittarudhirotpādane saṃghabhede ca saṃsūcane sandhāya bhāṣitam ity api duṣkṛtaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.551_0: / naiṣu na nājñapayeyur methakena karmaṇā ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.557_0: / svapravāsanasya kartari saṃghe mithyāśāyenaiṣāsyātra pravṛttir iti vaktṛtvasya mṛṣā /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.558_0: / coditatve bhikṣuṇādhiśīlam avacanīyatvasyātra bhikṣubhir ātmanaḥ kṛteḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.581_0: / [13b5] sambaddhe ca sānuvṛttau anyatrānadhiṣṭhitatadgotrāt prabhṛty anyatra /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.583_0: / na pramīlya pratyāstaraṇaṃ gacchen na ced anyaiva pratiprāptir iti saṃsthā /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.584_0: / vāse devam abhipretya gato kālasampattau tatra yācitvaitat* /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.590_0_0: / sabhikṣukasakapāṭakatvaṃ* sāhitam āvāsyavarṣattā devasya varṣāśaṅkitā vā jalāntaritatvaṃ gantavyasyety asyābhāvenādattasamvṛttir
V03vinsutru:vin_2.590_0_1: aṇāstīrṇakaṭhinaḥ saṃghāṭīṃ* vinā na kvacid* gacchet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.592_0: / dānam avipravāsasaṃvṛtteḥ saṃghāṭyā gurukatve jīrṇaṃ vādhikayoḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.605_0_0: / kuḍyaparikṣipto grāme yāvat ṣaḍgavayuktena vaṃśaśakaṭena[14a3] sphuraṇam adhvanā vā kukkuṭasyotpātya nilayane vāṭaparikṣipte
V03vinsutru:vin_2.607_0: / tatsthāne trikaraṇīyaparisarpaṇātinā mana rajobhiś ca yāvatas tadagatasya saṃbhāvanaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.609_0: / na sīmāntaraṃ pṛthaktvaṃ krośāntān madhyataḥ parasya /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.621_0: / pūrṇavadasatyāṃ pūrakapratyāsāṃ māṃ nyūnaṃ māṃ samasāmantakāt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.635_0: / na nyāyyam utpāṭayed atraiva parikarma kṛtvāropayiṣya ity anusampādya cittaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.668_0: / anissaraṇam atrāgantukatvaṃ sadasatvarūpanirjñānārtham asya tena praśnaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.671_0: / gṛhṇīyān niḥsṛ[15a1] / / jyamānam atirekaṃ pātracīva[[ra]]śikyasaritakāyabandhanaṃ saṃgha upanikṣepāya /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.675_0: / pratigṛhṇīyād bhikṣuṇī mahārhaṃ vāsaḥ parivarhaṇāya kuryād bhikṣuṇyā sārddhaṃ parivarttaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.680_0: / cittaśraddham udbhāvya purataḥ sthāpayitva nira[15a3]pekṣaṇaṃ prakramaṇe
V03vinsutru:vin_2.699_0: / paraṃ gṛhiṇo dvādaśahastakaḥ paḍakottaram antaraṃ saptadvikaṣāṭakaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.704_0: / pūrvakasya ca pūrvalabdhau uttaralabdhāv adhikasya deyatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.714_0: / preṣitam akalpikaṃ cīvaramūlyaṃ pratikṣipya paripraṣṇapūrvakam upadiṣṭaṃ vaiyāpṛtyakaram ādiṣṭaṃ dūtenokto vṛttā[15b2]ntātvākhyānapūrvakañ codayeta /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.720_0: / vṛttāyām evaṃ pratiniḥśriṣṭau prayacchata uktapratiniḥsargād abhyupetadātṛcittagrahaṇānuṣṭhānāt pratigṛhṇīyāt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.749_0: / alabdhasamvṛtteḥ saty anyatra svakām atyakte vāna[[ti]]krānte /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.761_0: / prayogasyārddhaṃ duṣkṛtam ṛddher anyena nabhasā haraṇe nirmite ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.764_0: / ṣaṭ caturaṅgulo hasto rdhacaturtha[[ḥ]] hastakaḥ puruṣaś ca caturhastakaṃ dhanus tat śatapañcakaṃ krośaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.779_0: / [16a5] dānapateḥ svāmitvādhimokṣo vaiyyapṛtyakarasya svāmitvādhimokṣo vaiyāpṛtyākarasya svāmitvābhyupagamanamaidhiṣṭhānam iti kalpāḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.808_0: / bandhakaṃ dviguṇam ādāya sākṣisamvatsaraṃ āsadivasasaṃghasthavirovārika gṛhītṛdhanalā[16b4]bhānāropya patre /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.810_0: / anyena dadyāt sāṃghikaṃ saṃghabhaktopakrīṇate dhānyaṃ mūlyena /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.819_0: / akaraṇaṃ parārthe py utsṛjya ratnatrayaṃ paṇāpaṇaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.828_0: / nādhilobhaṃ kurvīt pariskāre tyadhyāvasānaṃ na patrād astadhāyet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.849_0: saṃghe sāmagrivelāyāṃ śvo 'ham āyusmanta unna[[taṃ]] pātraṃ cārayiṣyāmi yusmābhiḥ svakasvakāni pātrāṇi gṛhītvā saṃghamadhye vataritavyam iti /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.852_0: / sthavi[17a4]redaṃ [[pātraṃ]] svacchaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ paribhogakṣamaṃ sa ced ākāṃkṣasi gṛhāṇeti yathā guṇaṃ rucyā grahaṇaṃ ayācanaṃ gṛhitasyāntaritena /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.862_0: / bhūyas tāyāṃ vā durniyogataḥ sauṣṭhave vā /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.872_0: / samastayor vyastayor vā kāyavācor āchedārthaṃ pravṛttis tasya /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.901_0: // pudgale nyatra saṃghe vā saṃkalpitasyānyena cīvarasya [18a1] jānatātmani pariṇāmato labdhau /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.909_0: / kalpate yā cchayā pratinidhyantare sugatasya dānam /

V03vinsutru:vin_2.921_0: / anudbhū[18a3]tāv atra kāle dānapater aparāṇi sāmantakavihāreṇa sārddham /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.931_0: / nirdoṣam asampattau caityāntare tallābhasya pariṇamanam utsṛjya bodhidharmacakramahāprātihāryadevāvataraṇānām ebhyo 'nyatra /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.932_0: / vyatītaṃ divasam adhiṣṭhitasya sāptāhikasya bhikṣuṃ śrāyet /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.936_0: / [18a5] atyaye 'hne kalpikasyābhyavahāryasya bhuktivad ity atra vyavasthā /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.937_0: / yasyātrārthe kalpanaṃ taṃ pratyanāpattiḥ kalpitenāsyābhaṅgayoḥ sannihitam /

V03vinsutru:vin_2.939_0: / kaccit sthā [a]tra pariśuddhā ityā[18b1]tṛtīyapariprasnāt poṣadhe śuddhasaṃjñasya tūṣṇīm bhāvenātināmanāyā duṣkṛtam /

V03vinsutru:vin_2.972_0_0: / śṛṇvantvāyuṣmanto kuleṣu kuladūṣakā āśrameṣv āśramadūṣakās tadyathā sampanne śālikṣetre 'śanirvicakrā nipated yāvad eva
V03vinsutru:vin_2.972_0_1: tasyaiva śāler utsādāya vināśāyānayena vyasanāya saṃpanne vā ikṣukṣetre mañjiṣṭhi[19a1]kā nāma rogajātir niyate[d] yāvad
V03vinsutru:vin_2.972_0_2: eva tasyaivekṣor utsādāya vināśāyānayena vyasanāya mā yūyam āyuṣmanto 'nena bhikṣunānayā bhikṣuṇyā śāsanaṃ pramiṇuta eṣa
V03vinsutru:vin_2.972_0_3: bhikṣur eṣā ca bhikṣuṇī dagdhena dhānā aprarohaṇadharmā asmin dharmavinaye bhagavantaṃ paśyata sthavirasthavirāṃś ca bhikṣūn
V03vinsutru:vin_2.982_0: / [19a3] sthairyeṇa ced artho jñaptipūrvakam arthaṃ kuryuḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.984_0: / pudgalabhikṣusaṃghābhaktalābhasya mithyāpariṇāmakatvena bhikṣor anyatrāpy anāmnā coktau /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.989_0_0: / prāka tataḥ saptāṣṭeṣu divaseṣv atas tasya maṇḍalakagandhapuṣpadīpadhūpabalidānatridaṇḍakaṃ bhāṣaṇadakṣiṇadeśanāṃ kṛtvā
V03vinsutru:vin_2.989_0_1: yā devatā 'smin vṛkṣe 'dhyuṣitā sā 'nyad bhavanaṃ samanveṣatvanena vṛkṣeṇa stūpasya saṃghasyeti-karaṇīyaṃ bhaviṣyatīty uktā
V03vinsutru:vin_2.990_0: / vikāraś ced agnimokṣarudhirasyandanaśākhākampanapatraśaṭanādir udṛśyeta pakṣe 'tra [19a5] dānamātsaryayoḥ saṃvarṇanivivarṇanaṃ kuryāt /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1007_0: / sādhu syād yady ayaṃ chidyetety uktor niyuktiḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1015_0: / chedane ca kuśāder āpadyavabadhena tenāsambhave mokṣaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1018_0: / saṃsparśo 'gninā kṣatiḥ śastranakhaśūkhairmlānyutpāṭana utdalanabhiducchittir iti kalpāḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1021_0: / [19b4] samyamktvasaṃkhyām agninā kalpane phalānāṃ kalpane samudāyarūpasya tantrīkaraṇam /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1025_0: / nānabhikṣitaṃ śītena vāriṇā sāptāhikaṃ yāvaj jīvakam abhyavaharet /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1030_0: / avadhyāne vā svagatenārthena saśrutaṃ kṣepe vā paravyapadeśena /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1034_0: / na svayam enaṃ dveṣyaḥ karmaṇi yujjīta /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1042_0: / tasmād vadhyadarśanaparipraśne viyapa tāvat pānīyaṃtāvat piba viśrāmya tāvan na paśyāmi [20a2] na khaṃ vā paramārthataḥ sattvaṃ napaśyāmi vadhyaś cet yuktāv anāpattiḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1043_0: / na yatra sākṣitvena karaṇam āpatet tatrāvasthānaṃ bhajeta /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1048_0: / tad atikra[20a3]māya vismṛtyāpi prasthānam antaś ca svapnasamāpatyādinā viparokṣībhāvaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1054_0: / dvayor ekatra niṣāde paścād utthāyinaḥ karaṇīyavattā /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1058_0: / eṣa vihāraḥ paśya cedaṃ śayanāsaṃ gṛhāṇa cāpāvaraṇīdānam ity avalokanāni /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1059_0: / saṃbhedās trayo vātena parivarttanaṃ vṛṣṭyā puṭāntaraprāpti[ḥ] dīpikābhiś ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1060_0: / śayanāsanatvaṃ sāṃghikatā tasya svayaṃniyuktakṛtatopanikṣepasyābhyavakāśa iti kartṛṇi /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1067_0: / piṇḍāya cet praviṣajyāpraviṣṭe vātavarṣam āgacched vihārasthāḥ praveśayeyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1070_0: / vismṛtya ced bahusamatikrāntādhvano gato vā smṛtiṃ labheta na bhūya evaṃ kariṣyāmīti cittam utpā[20b1]dayed vācaṃ ca bhāṣeta /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1072_0: / kartṛtvaṃ prāptatāyām atra yena pratijñātaṃ prakramiṣannāvasād asaṃkaṭaprāpto 'bhisaṃkṣipet śayanāsanam /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1079_0: / antaramārge ced bhikṣuṃ paśyet taṃ pradeśam asmai brūyāt /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1080_0: / dvāre ced antargṛhopanimantraṇāyāṃ badha āgacchet kuḍyasya mūle vṛkṣasya vā nidhāyādhvani praviśet /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1085_0: / sthāpayeyuḥ gacchan vayam āneṣyāma iti bruvatsu /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1092_0: / ekānte 'sau tiṣṭhet svakarma kurva[20b4]nn avadhānadānañ ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1105_0: / kuśalapakṣāpagacchaty ācāryopādhyāye na ca ced anyathā vṛddhiḥ kuśalapakṣasya pṛṣṭhato gacchet /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1110_0: [21a1] // svayam aśakto gurutayā vṛttānāṃ navakaiḥ saha parivṛttiḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1112_0: / dadyur vihārāntare yācyamānaṃ śayanāsanaṃ vastrañ ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1114_0: / vātavarṣa n ced antarmārge syād vṛkṣasya mūle kuḍyasya vā sthalaṃ kuryuḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1121_0: // kṛtaṃ saṃstaram antargṛhe ..c chorayeyur avalokya gṛhapatiṃ*
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1123_0: / kṛtatvam asya śironte pādānte vā kṛtatve /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1129_0: / anyadā kālena kālaṃ pratyevekṣaṇaṃ parivartanañ ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1132_0: / avabadhya ra[21a4]jvā vṛkṣe valalambya caṃkrame(yu)ṣu kakṣapiṇḍakānāṃ sthāpanaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1134_0: / prāg gataṃ prāk prakramiṣyanty asmāt tulyatvaṃ sāhyopabhoge /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1164_0: / na cet sarvatvena śailaḥ pakvaśailo dārumayo vā /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1175_0: // aparājitaṃ sūtraṃvinayamātṛkādharam a[21b4]nunaviṃ*śativarṣaṃ nāgaralapitam upanāmitakāyatve bhikṣuṇyā kṛtapratikriyāṃ bhikṣuṇyavavādakaṃ saṃmanyeran* /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1181_0_0: / samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaḥ pariśuddhasamaveto navadyo mā [21b5]vaḥ kaścid asaṃmata[[ḥ]] saṃghena pudgalo vavadate saṃghād
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1181_0_1: va āgacchati pudgalo vavādako na vaḥ kaścid utsahate bhikṣur avavadituṃ saṃghād vo vavādānuśāsanī apramādena bhaginyaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1184_0: / ekenāpi vinā tassa[[asa]]mmatasya ca bhikṣuṇya[va]vādena pūrvaṃ sammata..syāsammatatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1189_0: / na ced apāvṛtadvāras tadā tatbhūtasyāgrato vihārasya varṣakaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1198_0: / na cet* mūṣitāyai saubhāṣiṇikasyopasaṃpadyamānāyai pari[22a3]vartakena vā //
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1212_0: / muktvo sabhayatāyāṃ mārgasyaikasārthapālam abhinnaprayāṇatāyām ekabhikṣuṇyāpi mārgātivāhane/
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1216_0: // [22a5]sāntarāyatāyām ubhayakulasyocchṛjyā sambidhau yugapad ekanāvā tiryakpārasaṃtaraṇād anyatra /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1260_0: / grahaṇe py anyasya svīkaraṇaṃ duḥbhikṣo [22b5]āvat saṃpattinimantraṇakānāṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1263_0: / a[[na]]bhirucisaṃbhāvane dātur dvitrigrāsābhyavahārād ūrdhaṃ gṛhapate yaṃ bhikṣuḥ piṇḍakena vihanyate numodambā[[svā]]smai dadāmīty abhirocya /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.1275_0: / ardhapañcamānāṃ pakvata[ṇḍu]lamāgadhakaprasthāparimāṇānāṃ [23a2] prasthānām utsṛjya vyañjanam ūrdhaṃ sahāpi sahāyapratyaṃśena piṇḍapātaḥ /

V03vinsutru:vin_2.2589_0: / mauñjaṃ sāṇaṃ vālvajaṃ paṭṭikā vetravaibhaṅgukam iti /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.2593_0: / ūrṇā śaṇaḥ karpyāso natukāni patravaibhaṅgukañ ca /

V03vinsutru:vin_2.2598_0: / sanaiḥ aduḥkhanārthamāḍhakaṃ chitter veṣṭitāyāś ca natukaiḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.2610_0_0: / ya āyusman idaṃ cedañ ca karoti kiṃ* tasya bhavati sāpattiko natvāyusmatedaṃ cedaṃ ca kṛtaṃ kṛtam evaṃ [40a2] saty āyusmān*
V03vinsutru:vin_2.2610_0_1: sāpattiko nāham āyusmann eko pi tu sarvasaṃgho nenārthenāṅgatāvattvam āyusmān svām āpattiṃ* yathādharmaṃ pratikuru kin te
V03vinsutru:vin_2.2610_0_2: kariṣyati sarvasaṃgha iti prakrameṇa darśanapathe śiṣṭānām icchāyāṃ deśayet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.2612_0: / sarve cet* pañcadaśyām āpattim* pratīyur vimatim vā svapratikriyārtham āvāsāntare kañcit prasthāpayeyuḥ pratigṛhī[40a3]tṛsaṃvatyartham /

V03vinsutru:vin_2.2640_0_1: vimuktir anuprāptiḥ [40b1] sat*vṛttānā[[m ity e]]tat parāyanatvam vā /

V03vinsutru:vin_2.2644_0: / tat*rūpatāyāṃ pratyayasya sadvṛttoddeśavantam upadiśya vāsaṃ tatrāvatāre niyuñjīt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.2646_0: / kalpatāpaścād āgatānām arthe punaḥ karaṇam anayoḥ /

V03vinsutru:vin_2.2700_0: / tīrthyañ ca pratyavatiṣṭhamānaṃ sunigṛhītam adarśayat kopam ananusūyam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.2720_0: / vihārasvāmidevatārthañ ca gāthābhāṣaṇe bhikṣūṇāṃ niyogasya vacanaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.2722_0: / adya śuklapakṣasya pratipad vihārasvāmino vihāradevatānāṃ cārthāya gāthāṃ bhā[[ṣa]]dhvam iti /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.2724_0: / evaṃ nāma dānapati śvo bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhaktenopanimantrayate taṃ bhadanta kalyā[41a5]ṇaiḥ manobhiḥ pratyanukampāntām iti /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.2728_0: / nāvicāryānāgamyya poṣadhaṃ śūnyo yam ita sīmānaṃ badhnīyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.2745_0: / nordhaṃ madhyato rdhatṛtīyayojanāntāt sīmno bandhasya rūḍhiḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_2.2773_0: / [41b5] niravadyaṃ srāddhasya pradhānasya ca tuṣṭisaṃbhāvanāyām ācārānuśrāvaṇam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.11_0_0: / so ktagandhaiś cāṅgerīpaṭalakagate śukle vāsasy upanikṣiptāḥ śalākā vṛddhānte niveśyā yañ cāyaṃ cāsminn āvāse kriyākāro
V03vinsutru:vin_3.11_0_1: yo yusmākam utsahate tena kriyākāreṇāsminn āvāse varṣāvastuṃ sa śalākāṃ grihṇātu na ca vaḥ kenacid antarvarṣe saṃghamadhye
V03vinsutru:vin_3.11_0_2: raṇam utpā[42a2]dayitavyo yo vaḥ kasyacit kiñcij jānāti sa idānīṃ* vadanta yo [[vo]] ntarvarṣe saṃghe raṇam utpādayiṣyati
V03vinsutru:vin_3.11_0_3: tasya saṃgha uttara upaparīkṣitavyaṃ matsyata iti bhikṣūn vedayeta /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.16_0: / naivāsikānā[42a3]m asy etad ante śanaiḥ sthāpanama /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.17_0: / gaṇayitvā pravedanam iyadbhir bhikṣubhir asminn āvāse śalākā gṛhīteti /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.18_0: / anta tasya tattāḍakakuñjikena purataḥ sthitvā rocanopakramaṃ
V03vinsutru:vin_3.18_1: sthavirāmuko vihāraḥ salābhaḥ sacīvariko gṛhāṇeti yathāguṇam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.19_0: / jñātvoddeśam astūpasaṃghārthe gatasya gantryā bhāgitvaṃ [42a4] vṛkṣamūlaharitasārdhalasthaṇḍileṣv api yathāvṛddhikoddeśaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.29_0: / na sasave py atra sāṃghike tiṣṭhed āprāsādapuṣkiriṇīdvārakoṣṭhakapariṣaṇḍacaṃkramasthānavṛkṣāt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.33_0: / varṣopagamane syuḥ kecid āgantava iti vastu śayanāsanañ ca sthāpayeyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.40_0: / pūrvāhṇe kvacit pāṭhasvādhyāyāvasthānacaṃkramāṇāṃ kvacid madhyāhne paratrānyatra [[pātra]]cīvarasthāpanam āvāso paratra rātrāv ity asya yogaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.51_0_0: / ayam amutrartāv ahaurātre tadavayave vā bhaviṣyaty ayam amutrāyām ācāryasya bhaviṣyaty ayam upādhyāyasya sā[42b3]rdham
V03vinsutru:vin_3.51_0_1: vihāriṇo yam ayam antevāsina ālaptakāder ayam iti vihārān nuddiśeyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.58_0: / na sāṃghikam ava[42b4]naddhaṃ nāśanadharmaṇe śucinā śrāmaṇerāya śayanāsanaṃ kaścid dadyāt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.62_0: / na vaṣ kenacit sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam vinā pratyāstaraṇena paribhoktavyaṃ na kalpapratyāstaraṇena na malapratyāstaraṇeneti vedayeta /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.64_0: / [42b5] samayam utkramya paribhuktāvāchindyād ārocya niḥśraye niḥśritasyānyasya saṃghe /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.65_0: / amukena dānapatināmukena vaiyyapṛtyakareṇāmukena gocaragrāmakena svaḥ saṃgho varṣā upagamiṣyatīty ārocayet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.69_0: / na yasminn abhikṣukatvam akapāṭakatvañ ca sahitam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.83_0: / laṅghayed etad bhaktabhaiṣajyopasthāyakābhāve śaktau tair vinā yāpayitum* /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.89_0: / na kurvīt* nāsty asyaikapoṣadhatāyām āvāsayor utthānam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.101_0: / na nāvyutsṛjya prāptapṛthivīm upanibaddhām vā bhūmisthe sthire saṃjanato ntarāpayāyitvam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.102_0: / dhvansas tad dṛśam abhiniḥsṛtyādharmapakṣasaṃkrāntāv aruṇodgatau [43a6] na saṃdigdhatāyām* /
V03vinsutru:vin_3.113_0: / anāśaṃkyam anākṣiptatvaṃ tīrthyasya dṛṣṭer vivecanārthaṃ jñāteḥ karaṇīyenāgamādhigamayor ātmanaḥ kāṃkṣāvinodanārthaṃ gamanāyaitatkṛteḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_4.6_0: / yataḥ prabhṛti kelāyanam iyatbhiḥ divasaiḥ saṃghasya pravāraṇā bhaviṣyati yuṣmākam ārocitam bhavatv iti /
V03vinsutru:vin_4.11_0: / adya sarvarātrikaṃ dharmaśravaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati tatra yuṣmābhiḥ sāmagrī deyeti gocarārocya sūtravinayamātrakadharair adhiṣṭacaturdaśyāṃ sarvarātrikadharmaśravaṇadāpanam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_4.12_0: / parasyāntaiḥ prākkarmato dhamyayā viniścayakathayā rātrer atināmanam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_4.25_0: / sarvasaṃghena prativārite etat tvasya saṃghe nivedanam* /

V03vinsutru:vin_4.36_1_0: / na haiva vayam āyusmann ity arthaṃ sanniṣaṇṇāḥ sannipattitāḥ kaccid āyusman* vastu sthāpayen na putgalam ity api tu śīlaviśuddhyarthaṃ

V03vinsutru:vin_4.43_0: / karaṇadharmaśravaṇadā(da)nam ity eṣāṃ pralobhanāni prayuñjīran* asaṃpattāv ātmībhāvasya poṣadhaṃ kurvīran* maṇḍalakeṣu /
V03vinsutru:vin_4.44_0: / nanu yuṣmākam adya pravāraṇeti bruvāṇā[44a4]nām āgamayatāyuṣmantāgantukā yūyaṃ naivāsikā anenārtheneti prativadeyuḥ /

V03vinsutru:vin_5.29_0: / tasmai dadīta jñapty ādhāvanasyūtirañjaneṣv asau pūrvaṃgamaḥ syāt* /

V03vinsutru:vin_5.36_0: / gandhapuṣpārcitaṃ surabhidhūpadhūpita cāṃgeripaṭalakastham ekaṃ trivānekam ādāya vṛddhā[44b5]nte vasthitenāstṛtes sampādanaṃ pratipadiḥ /

V03vinsutru:vin_5.87_0: / yat tad āstṛtya pṛthak sīmakaraṇe cāsya sthānam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_6.14_0: / nainaṃ sāṃghikam akhaṭamaṃcapīṭhamapratyāstṛtamatenāniṣādāt saṃvaraṇaṃ vā dattāntarddhānam upabhuñjīta /
V03vinsutru:vin_6.34_0: / pañcānāṃ labheḥ bhājane karaṇam adyalābho bhājayiṣyate tatra yuṣmābhiḥ sannipatitavyam ity ārocanaṃ saṃghe /
V03vinsutru:vin_6.54_0: / naikatvam arddhasya suvarutā ca labdher anarhapraveśe kāraṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_6.56_0: / uṣitatvaṃ bahutaram uṣitasya tatkālake lābhe hānāyāsyāvṛttau mṛtyau ca /

V03vinsutru:vin_6.83_0: / antargṛhasthatve pātracīvarasya yasmai gṛhapatinā dānaṃ tasyaiśitvam /

V03vinsutru:vin_6.94_0: / ratnā dīpitvaṃ saṃbhāvane yāvadbhya etat tāvatsu nāvakarmikasya viniyogaḥ samaṃ sa glānopasthāyakrātvatadgāmitvaṃ pariskāraṣaṭkasya nādhiṣṭheyatvam /
V03vinsutru:vin_6.101_0: / hāyate glānasyoktoktena dāne yathoktena dāne yathoktaṃ kāryatvaṃ /

V03vinsutru:vin_6.153_0: / na rajakena raktam araktaṃ vā vastraṃ śocayet /

V03vinsutru:vin_6.195_3: / avaśyāya pariśudhe śakyataratvaṃ hastam ardhena bhagasya /
V03vinsutru:vin_6.210_0: / kālena kālam asya śocanaṃ rañjanañ ca /

V03vinsutru:vin_6.250_0_0: / pidhvīyatāṃ dvāraṃ na deyaṃ mṛgayate nivāryo gṛhṇāna iti pratyā[47b6]yitasya pratīcchyāvyupekṣitavatopahṛtau viśvāsavastutāñ
V03vinsutru:vin_6.250_0_1: copanītena mamaivāyaṃ sahāya ityādi pratipādanayā dāsyatvam /

V03vinsutru:vin_6.269_0: / pravedite smaśaniko ham ity upanimantritaḥ praveśaṃ vihārakulayoḥ paribhogañ cānutsṛṣṭasvīkārasya śmaśaniko bhajet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_6.273_0: / ūrṇāṃ saṇaṃ karpāsaṃ natukaṃ patramañjarīñ ca /

V03vinsutru:vin_6.316_0: / nānuddiśya dvayaṃ śāstṛpūjāyāṃ datte bhikṣuṇīnāṃ sāṃghike praveśaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_6.322_0: / tasyaivātra sannipātagatam anuṣṭheyaṃ saṃghasthavireṇa mūlyasya karaṇam /

V03vinsutru:vin_6.352_0: / na cel lābhasya pātracīvarād atirekass amā[48b6]dāpya /
V03vinsutru:vin_6.359_0: / nāsāṃghāṭyāṃ chinnādhiṣṭhānaniyamaḥ nāsatve tadrūpāṇāṃ pratyayānām icchanna[49a1] /
V03vinsutru:vin_6.369_0: / na lomasya viheṭhe syānyathā prāvṛtiṃ bhajet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_6.382_0: / adhiṣṭhāya tattvenānujñātā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ dhārayed uparāṃ vikalpānekam api /

V03vinsutru:vin_6.405_0: / grahaṇaṃ punar labdhau staupikasya vṛtter mū[49a6]laphalekṣubhyo nyasya bhaktārthasyoddeśopajīvyasya vā bhājyatvaṃ svīkārāya /
V03vinsutru:vin_6.416_0: / nānavachinnaṃ bhojanam anulābhe bhikṣuṇīnāṃ bhuktavatve tatrāpraveśaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_6.419_0: / karaṇaṃ sabhikṣutāyām aśaktau teṣāṃ bhikṣuṇyā dakṣiṇādeśa[49b2]nasya sāmānyañ cārayiṣyatīti cārakam āhārasya pratyupasthitapādau dānāya saṃghasthaviro niyuñjīt /
V03vinsutru:vin_6.420_0: / yathāsaṃbhāvanam ity avalokya parṣadaṃ prabhūtyelpatve bhaktasya tadākhyānapūrvakaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_6.422_0: / na cānudghoṣite saṃprāptam iti vṛddhānta ādau gṛhṇīt /
V03vinsutru:vin_6.426_0: / pratidādyata ity ato nyena manasā saṃghaḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt /
V03vinsutru:vin_7.2_0: / pūrveṇa puṇḍakaccho nāma dāvaḥ purataḥ puṇḍavardhanasya /
V03vinsutru:vin_7.11_0: / sapta padāny antato gṛhiṇā paribhukte bahupuṭau api /
V03vinsutru:vin_7.26_0: / piṇḍībhavajjane ca janapade kholāṃ pūlāṃ ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_7.29_0: / kakṣahastikhaṭuṃkāś ca tadanyacaṇḍamṛgān[[ṇ]]ām apy ebhir ākṣepaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_7.42_0: / atrāpy atra tadrūpeṣv api pratyayeṣv ani[50a2]pattavyatā pratigṛhṇīt tarkṣacarma cakṣuṣe /
V03vinsutru:vin_7.46_0: / vāte niṣadyā nipadyā ca sarvam arśaḥsvetad ity asyopayogaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_7.56_0: / na nābhijñāstaraṇe kṛtvā savidhānam agādhamambho vagāhet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.5_0: / tadvac chuktaśulukadadhimaṇḍodaśvinmaṇḍakāni dakabhinnāni paṭṭapariśrutāni svacchāni mukhadarśīni śarakāṇḍavarṇāni /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.6_0: / ayuktiḥ prāg evaṃ [pa]ścād upasaṃpannena yarśanasya sa[50a5]mānavyaṃjanena /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.13_0: / atattvāt taddravyasya kālikaṃ ced anupasaṃpannena marddhanaṃ pariśrāvaṇañ ca paṭena /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.18_0: / tadasadatiriktakālāśritāvarūḍhiprāpte tasyāṃ cāgamyatvād bhaviṣyataḥ prākṛtānām anadhiṣṭheyatāpatteḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.32_0: / candanaṃ cavikā padmakaṃ guḍūci devadāru haridrārdrakam /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.43_0: / tadyathā saindhavaṃ sauvarcalaṃ viṭaṃ sāmudraṃ romakam /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.46_0: / yāvad āptaṃ dānaṃ snātvā punarasaṃ sparṣaṃ sakṛt snānam iti kaṣāyadānam /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.49_0: / tadākhyaṃ punar uccāraprasrāvau stanyayānayāyināṃ vatsakānāṃ viṣe tāv upakārau /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.58_0: / jarakucoccārayavāścedakālopayojyatāyāṃ yācakṛtabhaiṣajyasya tadarthaṃ sphareyuḥ nānyāt paribhuñjīt /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.62_0: / sānye pi sadbhāvas tadadyācārasya tasmād pūrvakalpena tatsāhye pravṛttiḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.63_0: / [50b6] nānāpannasya rūpāntaram apūrvarūpatvaṃ tasmān na visaṃpaccitasya parataḥ svakalpenākalpanam /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.64_0: / sampadyate prakṣālanena śaktataṇḍuleṣu pravṛttāvasthānasya svamātrasaṃkhyatā guḍasya /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.84_0: / svasaṃbhavatāṃ tatra bhārīkṛtya sūtaṃ vā nidhānam /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.88_0: / [51a3] anayaneta svayam upayātre vināśahetor abhāve nusaṃpannasya /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.117_0: / dvādaśāṅgulā sādhvī na tīkṣṇā puruṣā vā /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.118_0: / sthavikāyāṃ nidhānaṃ mrakṣayitvā sarpiṣā tailena vā /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.129_0: / apetatāyāṃ paligodhasya sthitatve ca manojñasya purataḥ khādyabhojyasya mokṣaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.152_0: / rakṣyas saṃsargas tasmād ūne vigatavegatāyāñ ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.154_0: / prāsādikañ ca sādhu tasmāc chuklanatrakena sūtīkaraṇam /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.158_0: / na laśunaṃ palāṇḍuṃ gṛñjanakaṃ vā paribhuñjīta /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.160_0: / nopayuñjanaḥ parataś ca saptāhaṃ laśune palāṇḍau trirātram ekarātraṃ gṛñjanavihāraṃ paribhuñjīt /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.190_0: / yāvantastā[va?]ntas sannihitāś caturthe saṃmaṃkalpikaśālām vāṅ bhāvakavacanodāhārataḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.203_0: / tadyathā drākṣyadāḍimakharjūrākṣoṣṭau vātāma urumānarāmāpikākurumāyikānikocobabhūḥ piñcitikā[52a4]puṣkarañ ca tadākhyam /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.217_0: / yato nāgatiḥ śabdasya vihāre tatra kalpakāram āpanam /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.221_0: / nābhyām anupānapaṭṭakāc cānyat kaṃsabhājanaṃ pudgalo dhārayet /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.223_0: / grahaṇaṃ rakṣāyai pratipādyamānānām apy anyānāṃ samānavyañjanānām /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.236_0: / nāpārśvanihitatāṃ prāgāvāt pātra[52b2]sya piṇḍāya pravṛttau bhajet /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.255_0: / yathā vṛddhikayā [52b4] niṣādanāya dāpanāya ca mahāsannipāte bhikṣūṇām uddeśaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.269_0: / na yena mantrita tato 'nyasya labdheḥ svīkāre 'sty ayuktatvam /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.273_0: / nāntaṃ visarjayet [52b6] dṛṣṭiśīlasampannābhyāmāntasyānyatra yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dānam atiriktasya cālopād yātrākāriṇo grahaṇam /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.275_0: / māt[ā]pitṛglānaputrahyāpekṣakukṣīmatībhyo vineyākāṃ kṣāpiṇḍapātaṃ spṛṣṭavate gṛhiṇe ca saṃprāptāya saṃvibhāgaś ca tatḥ karaṇam /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.280_0: / na nimantraṇake śraddhadeyatvena pātrādhiṣṭhāne 'syocchiṣṭāśilāṃ yathā sukhakaraṇam /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.297_0: / śrāmaṇere ca sārddhaṃ paravadayoge kalpakārakānāṃ piṇḍīkṛtya dānam /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.307_0: / nedamito vā dehīti bhojanārtham upaviṣṭapariveṣṭāraṃ bodhayet /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.335_0: / tasmān mukham akāle pravāritaś codgārārāme nirmādayed anyaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.348_0: / adurgandhībhāvaprāṇakāsaṃbhavāya kālena kālaṃ śocanaṃ śoṣaṇañ ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_8.403_0: / nirdoṣaṃ śūte kukṣeḥ prāgantāt poccanamātraṃ kṛtvāsanaṃ nāto nyaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_9.28_0: / kalpikam aśaktau karmakārikāyānitīritaṃ tayā bhikṣuṇā kṛtam vacanam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_9.31_0: / na yasya kriyateḥ [54a5] tasmād asatvaṃ pūrakatvasya chandapariśuddhir vidheḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_9.53_0_0: / tatsīmāntargatasyārhasya pūraṇe kāyataḥ chandato vā saṃniṣāde nanupraviṣṭatvaṃ pratikroṣantā ca yasya tatkarma tato nyasya
V03vinsutru:vin_9.53_0_1: pratikūlaṃ cet dharmaṃ vācyutasyeryāpathāt* pra[54b2]kṛtisthasya saṃyatasya vā cotsṛjyānabhijñasāntarāt* vyagratvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_9.56_0: / aprakṛtisthatvam atra cānyatra vā karaṇīye karaṇīyakṛtau ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_9.64_0: / na niyamya kālaṃ paunaḥpunye nyatra vā /
V03vinsutru:vin_9.67_0: / yasya pūraṇe narhatva śalākācāraṇe pi tasya /
V03vinsutru:vin_9.68_0: / saṃghabhede sya rūḍhir anarhe na cāraṇe śalākāṇāṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_9.82_0: / masūrikādau striyāḥ [54b6] vṛddhānte nanyatantratāyāṃ saṃghe sthitasya parārthe sapraṇatam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_9.87_0: / pātrabhaiṣajyaṃ vāme pāṇo pratisthāpya pratichādya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā /
V03vinsutru:vin_9.90_0: / rohanty asānnidhye cīvarasya manasā vikalpa utsarge dhiṣṭhānañ ca nānutsṛṣṭe pūrvatra /
V03vinsutru:vin_9.97_0: / ādau [55a2] ca triḥpragṛhītāṃ jalitvaṃ tādarthye divasārocane ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_9.98_0: / aupayikam ity ante svārthaṃ vijñaptena vacanaṃ pudgalaś cet /
V03vinsutru:vin_10.5_0: / ubhayasthatvam ekasminn e[55a4]katra pāde parasmin paratra /
V03vinsutru:vin_10.19_0: / na hāsyabhāvena kasyacit sthūlam arūḍhibuddhyā bhedotkṣepayoḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_10.21_0: / nānyeṣāṃ nānāsaṃvāsikebhyo barhāṇāṃ pūraṇe gaṇena jñaptivācanayoḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_10.23_0: / saṃpannatvaṃ [55a6] jñaptiśrutāv asya nāvidhir bhavyarūpe pratinidhinā dūtena pravrājanam /
V03vinsutru:vin_10.33_0: / na bhikṣubhikṣuṇītvayor anyakarmavastupratijñapite codakena kalpayati sāṃmukhyaṃ praṇidhikaraṇam /
V03vinsutru:vin_10.40_0_1: roma pātayato niḥsaraṇaṃ pravarttayataḥ samīcīm upadarśayato viramato nimittād avasāraṇaṃ yācite /
V03vinsutru:vin_10.48_0_0: / tatkṣama[55b4]ṇakam atra karmaṇaḥ sthāne 'vasāraṇaṃ prati pratītāyām[ā]pattāvapratikṛtāyām apratikāryāyāṃ saṃvareṇādṛṣṭim
V03vinsutru:vin_10.48_0_1: udbhāvayantam anicchantaṃ pratikṛtim anuṣṭhātum anutsṛjantaṃ ca pāpikāṃ dṛṣṭim utkṣipeyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_10.49_0: / ihaivainām āpattiṃ pratikurvīthā ayam eva tv āsaṃghaḥ prasrambhayiṣyati ity evaṃ brūyyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_10.60_0: / sannihite tatrāsrame pratideśanīyasya garhyam āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyanta dharmaṃ pratide[śa]yāmi iti /
V03vinsutru:vin_10.88_0: / tasmād arūḍhasyāsya pṛthak tadānīm utthāpyatā prathamaṃ ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_10.102_0: / nāsāṃ manye praṇidhātṝṇām avasāraṇasya praṇihitau rūḍhiḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_10.110_0: / vikṛteḥ kriyamāṇapraṇidhinā dhvaste[56a5]na ca niṣkāsya mānena bhajane bhāṇḍasya choraṇam /
V03vinsutru:vin_10.150_0: / śuddhir ekasya purato deśanena saṃghāvaśeṣato hrīmataḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_11.1_0: / apratītatve saṃghāvaśeṣāntardhāne [56b4] ntāsthitapratichādacittasyāśaktavattāyāṃ kṛtaṃ ne vā kiṃ* vā kīdṛśyaṃ ceti smartum anupasaṃpa katotkṣiptayoś cānutthānaṃ pratichādasya /
V03vinsutru:vin_11.13_0: / śodhite vastuni sāṣānuṣṭhānam anirjñāne pratichādakālasyāsaṃvya ānany ūnatvasya saṃśrayaṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_11.19_0: / aparimāna ity anirjñāne sya saṃśrayasaṃbahulāḥ parimānavatya iti prābhūtye /
V03vinsutru:vin_11.23_0: / carato paraprāksampannapraticikīrṣotpattau pṛ[tha]g* dānam ekaṃ caraṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_12.45_5: / prāg* dvāramokṣyād vihārādau ca paryuṣitavac caritapattau /
V03vinsutru:vin_12.45_13: / arūḍair aprakṛtistheṣu paripāsamānāpy aśikṣācaraṇānāṃ / [end of R om.]
V03vinsutru:vin_12.50_0: / na yatryānye triḥprabhṛtayaḥ sarvathā tadākhyacaraṇās tatra taccaret* /
V03vinsutru:vin_12.57_0: / [57b4] kalahakārakāgamanañ ca śrutvā bhayañ cedataḥ pratini[ḥ]sṛjetāṃ saṃghasannidhau pudgale vā /
V03vinsutru:vin_12.59_0: / chedas tadahorātrasya prakṛtisthena sārdham ekachadane parivāsikamānāsyacāriṇoḥ śayyāyāṃ bahi[ḥ]sīmni ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_12.61_0: / nāsannidhau tatsīmni śrāvyāṇām asyotthānaṃ nirdoṣaṃ tadaharā[57b5]gatau sīmāntare gamanam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_12.62_0: / na parivāsikena sārdham ekachadane pārivāsikaḥ śayīt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_12.63_0: / na tīrthyupanivāsasthasya tena sārdham atra doṣaḥ //
V03vinsutru:vin_13.7_0: / āgamaya tvam āyuṣmaṃ glānas tvam aprayojyama ity āyusmaṃ bhūteti glāno sāv ananuyojyā iti prativadeyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_13.16_0: / savacanīyaṃ tv āyuṣman karomi na tvaṃ yo smādāvāsādanavalokya prakramitavyam asti me āyuṣmati praṇihitaṃ vacanāyeti /
V03vinsutru:vin_13.21_0: / karaṇam asyatra sthāpakaiḥ sthāpitasya tena [58a2] sārdham upasāraṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_13.23_0: / vakṣyāmy atrāmutra vā vase mutra vā vāstuni yatra ceṣṭam ity āropya cāmattiṃ* darśayitvāparādham utsṛjanena /
V03vinsutru:vin_13.24_0: / śīladṛṣṭyā cārājīva vipatyā sarvasyāsya codanādeḥ kriyāyāṃ ruḍhiḥ samūlakaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_13.31_0: / nāpoṣadhe tasya na kṛtau kṛtatve vā strītve sthāpakasyai[ka]tarasya puṃstve sthāpitatvaṃ sthāpitatā /
V03vinsutru:vin_14.1_0: // na nānātvāya saṃghasya prabhāviṣṇum akā[58a4]maṃ codayed unmoṭayed vā codayatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_14.2_0: / na yatra prativirodhas tena sārdham abhinamane samāsīta /
V03vinsutru:vin_14.6_0: / dharme vinaye caitadvatām adharme ced abhiniveśo jñātvā saṃghasāmagrīn na vidyate /
V03vinsutru:vin_14.7_0: / tasmān na tad anyānāṃ saṃbhūya kṛtau karmaṇo rūḍhin na paraspareṇāvyagratvam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_14.8_0: / [58a5] kaliparāyaṇatva eṣā tadvipakṣasya cāvandyatvam idaṃ dharmabhiḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_14.13_0: / mṛddhadvā vayam iti vadatsu yūtham api śramaṇāḥ śākyaputriyā sma ity ātmānam* [58a6] pratijānīdhve /
V03vinsutru:vin_14.14_0: / yeṣāṃ cedaṃ vṛttam iyaṃ vārtā kāruṇiko vaḥ śāstā yenaitad anujñātam etad api vo na prāpadyata iti prativadeyur anyatra /
V03vinsutru:vin_14.17_0: / nāpi sāritāām eṣāṃ sāmagyasya vinā sāmagrīlābhenotthāpanaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_14.24_0: / karmaṇaḥ kṛtāvadharmavādibhir antaḥsīmni pṛthak tadbhedo tadacittena /
V03vinsutru:vin_14.28_0: / sthalasthair atra sanni ced bhikṣuṇīnām acodyatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_14.39_0: / tat tatā yadīyasyotsaṃghe pratipādanaṃ [58b3] dvayoś ced ubhayatra /
V03vinsutru:vin_15.3_0: / arūḍhir asyāsaṃghaparimāṇatve bhidyamānānām asatve cānyeṣām antaḥsīmni saṃghaparisānānām adharmadharmayoḥ tathātvena pratyavagatāv ānantaryaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.2_0: / padārthatathātve vipratipattir varjanaṃ sāpattikā sāmagryadānaṃ karmāṇi /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.28_0: / tena sasthavire saprātimokṣe nyatra saṃgha upanikṣepaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.37_0_0: / anupadhūta idaṃ vadet teṣāṃ ca [59a2] āyuṣmanta alābhānālābhādurlabho na sulabhā ye yūyaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyā
V03vinsutru:vin_16.37_0_1: kalahajātā viharata bhaṇḍanajātā vikṛhītā vivādam āpannām āyuṣmantaḥ kalaho mā bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho mā vivādaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.37_1: / nāsti dvayor yudhyato jaya ekasya jaya ekasya parājayaḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.37_2: nāsti dvayor dhāvato jaya ekasya jaya ekasya parājaya [59a3] iti /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.41_0: / kharamarthipratyarthikair gṛhītatve pragāḍham* ca vyāḍhatve teṣāṃ bhedāśaṃkitāyām asya saṃsrayaṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.49_0: / sannipātāyārocanaṃ : saṃghe sarvaiḥ sannipati[ta]vyaṃ* / śalākāś cārayiṣyāmīti /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.50_0: / tathā ced adharmaśalākādhikyasaṃpattiṃ* [59a5] manyeta na chandānupradānena sāmagrye cārayeta /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.51_0: / dakṣiṇena pāṇinā dharmaśalākānāṃ cāraṇakāle grahaṇaṃ vāmenetarāsāṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.52_1: sthavire yaṃ dharmaśalākā ajihmā avaṃkā akuṭil[ā] su[va]rṇā sugandhā sukhasaṃsparśā gṛhāṇeti dvayor vācor itarāṃ mṛgaya tena prayacchet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.53_0: / yathā dharmodbhavam* [59a6] manyeta tathā cārayec channam vā vṛtaṃ vā /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.54_0_0: / āyusman, upādhyāyena te dharmaśalākā gṛhītā ācāryeṇa samānopādhyāyena samānācāryeṇāla[pta]kena na saṃlaptakena saṃstutakena
V03vinsutru:vin_16.54_0_1: sapremakena tvam api dharmaśalākaṃ gṛhāṇa mātretaiḥ sārdhaṃ virukṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti vā karṇamūle tantunāyaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.57_0: / na bhedodbhavakṣāntyā nādharmyasya na jānannayo bhaviṣyattāṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.65_0: / nirvikriyasavikriyaś ca dviprakāraḥ prādeśikaḥ sakalasaṃghagataś ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.70_0: / bahūnām arthe trāsaṃghe deśyānām ekena pratikaraṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.79_0: / viparyayato dharmavinayatadviparyayāṇāṃ saṃghamadhye saṃcintyeti trikānvitaṃ codakam ādṛyeran /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.81_0: / saṃjñapanama saṃjñapanamarentaḥ piṭakānāṃ dhārayituran evaṃvidhasya samanuyuñjīrann enaṃ bhāvaḥ pratibodhāya sthānasthāpanena /
V03vinsutru:vin_16.84_0: / pratijñānaṃ coditena niṣṭhā dṛṣṭasatyatve prakṛṣṭataratve ca guṇato nyasya catuṣpramāṇīkaraṇaṃ gṛhiṇo pi /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.15_0: [60a3] anujāniyur anyeṣāṃ sāṃghike vastuni saṃghāya pudgalāya vā bhikṣave vāsavastu(na)karaṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.25_0: / nirdoṣam atadarthaṃ gatasya velāprāptau vihārāntare bhojanam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.27_0: / atiriktatāyāṃ bhikṣu mātrarthād grahaṇan na vihāram avyuperan* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.37_0: / darśanamatirukṣaśaraṇapṛṣṭhaṃ mā tvaṃ jvarita iti [60a6] saṃjñayā khyāpanam ity atropāya[ḥ] /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.41_0: / utthāyaivāsau kālyam avalokayed vihāram* caityā[ṅ]ganaṃ ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.42_0: / [..] uccāraś cet tatkṛtaḥ chorayet* prasrāvaś ced u[ddhū]ṣennakharikābhilikhitaṃ cet samaṃ kuryāt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.69_0: / cāraṇe syaiṣāṃ vyāpāro bhukte ca gopane /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.76_0: / tat prathato bhuktvā vaṃsam ādāya kākacaṭakapāra([ta])tādīnāṃ bhuñjaneṣu tena vāraṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.91_0: / dvayaṃ paligodho bhakṣyamāṇena vā dantakāṣṭhād aśucinā vā tadbhūmiparikarmaṇāt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.92_0: / paligodha tatra nāgnyam ekacīvaratā cadevandane pañcamaṇḍalakena jaṃghaprapī[ḍa]nikayā ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.93_0: / na kṣut*vantaṃ jīv[e]ty abhivanded utsṛjyāntyāvayasamāgārikāṃ ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.98_0: / nāsya nirūpāpadaṃ nāma gotram vā gṛhṇīyāt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.116_0: / prārabdhasya ca vṛhatto lpasya vā karaṇārthaṃ bhañjanam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.127_0: / paścādbhaktaṃ taddāne kālo hemantaś ce[d] grīṣmaś ceti pūrvabhaktaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.171_0: / grahaṇāya saṃcāraṇe lohakaṇṭakānāṃ catu[61b3]ṣke py eṣu dānam /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.188_0: / sphuṭa(nā)naṃ kledaś ca kāṣṭhasya tasmād ayomayīnāṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.217_0: / aupapādukānāṃ satvānāṃ ghaṭiyaṃtravaccyavamānānām upapadyamānānāṃ ca rāgadveṣamohānāṃ pārāvatabhujaṃgasūkarākāreṇa /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.231_0: / agniśālāyāṃ mecakādi kurvatām agniṃ* ca jvālayatāṃ kumbhāṇḍaputrāṇāṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.232_0: / dānapater dīpaṃ dhārayato devadūti yasya ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.233_0: / nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitānāṃ kalaśa[hastā]nāṃ nāgakanyakānāṃ codakaṃ dhārayantīnāṃ pānīyamaṇḍape /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.236_0: / na vihāre nabhyavakāśe sadhūmam agniṃ* kuryād dhārayed dhārakuṭṭime sarvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.242_0: / avaśiṣṭam aṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ ca sarvasaṃghe [62a6] gaṇḍīm ākoṭṭya dharmyayā vā kathayāryeṇa vā tūṣṇīmbhāvena /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.243_0: / dharmotsave sekaḥ sukumāryāś ca gomayakārṣāḥ pradānam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.248_0: / ratnārthaṃ saṃmṛṣṭāmṛṣṭayor gandhakūṭipratimācaityayaṣṭichayānāṃ cāryāṃ gāthāṃ paṭhatā laṃghaṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.260_0: / tathāpy ayogyatve gomayamṛdāstambhasuśire kuṇyasya vā lepanam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.262_0: / na dvārakoṣṭhake prāsāde vā śayyāprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā vā dhāraṇaṃ kuryāt* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.265_0: / kuṭimāvināśārtham* [[62b3] maṇḍalam adhaḥpādakachedaṃ kāraye[nu]ṣamuṭake cainaṃ sthāpayen natukena vā veṣṭayet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.275_0: / nāpareṇe sārdham ekatra maṃce saṃ[s]tare nyatra vā /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.276_0: / kalpayed asaṃbhave lajjī pṛtha[k] pratyāsthī[tyā]ntare vṛṣikāpātrasthāvikādi dattvā smṛtim upasthāpya /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.277_0: / na trayād ūrdhaṃ pracitiḥ sāhyena maṃcarūḍhatāṃ bhajet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.281_0: / bhaje[d] āntargṛhe [62b5] upādhyāyenāpy āsanābhāve smṛtim upasthāpya /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.287_0: / saṃcāraṇe śayanāsanasya dvau ced ekena maṃcapīṭhasya vā grahaṇam apareṇa vṛśyādeḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.288_0: / naita[tsā]ṃghikamadayam ākarṣenniṣkarṣed dhīna tathā kuryād yathāsya
V03vinsutru:vin_17.291_0: / ātapanaṃ sye śoṣaṇaṃ prasphoṭanaṃ chidrer gaḍakadānam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.295_0: / aśakyapratisaṃskaraṇatāyāṃ dīpeṣu viniyogo vartikātvena ratnopayogeṣu pudgaladātṛkeṣv api /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.296_0: / anupayajyamānasyātra kardamena bhittistambhakavāṭasuṣireṣu ratneṣu lepanam ity anupratipattiḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.299_0: / na śa[63a2]kyaṃ sāṃghikam apaharantaṃ dṛṣ[ṭra] na nivārayet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.318_0: / na saty arthini kṛtakṛtya āvṛddhi bhojyam* dhāray[e]t* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.321_0: / nārthisadbhāve satyāṃ gatau sāṃghikasya paliguddhatāṃ bhajet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.324_0: / nāpitabhāṇḍañ ca suktyāṃ prakṣipya bhitto sthāpanam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.382_0: / kṛtatām atra saṃvidhānasya upadhivārikaṃ saṃghasthaviraḥ pṛcchet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.383_0: / vihāramoṣe na ced baddhatvaṃ samāyuktair upadhivārikasya dāsya /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.386_0: / nābaddhvā yāvad bhāvaṃ bandhanaiḥ dvāraṃ prakrāmeta /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.390_0: / gṛhiṇaś ced atrāgaccheyur dharmyam ebhyaṣkathām anyac ca
V03vinsutru:vin_17.403_0: / gṛṣme syāś cedārtham apanayaḥ pūrvasyāpi varṣāḥ svakledāntam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.407_0: / kvacid dantakā[64a2]ṣṭhabhakṣyaṇam* kvacin mukhaśocanaṃ kvacit* pādayor ity evaṃ na tatprasṛtatayā /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.411_0: / pṛthag pravṛttyāpi pāṭhako bahutaropasthāpanakāriṇām aśakta sānukampet* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.424_0: / na buddhavacanaṃ chandasi pade krame vā tatparāyaṇatayāropya paṭhita u[d]gṛhṇītad vahiḥ [64a4] śāstrāṇi samarthaḥ parasaṃjñapane anu[t]sṛjan buddhavacanābhiyogam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.434_0: / ārṣā gāthāṃ bhāṣaṇenainām abhimukhaṃ sthitvā saṃbo[64a5]dhyachaṭāśabdenāyanaprāpto 'nugṛhṇī[tā] /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.437_0: / tadbhāṇḍa samutsṛjya śastrakośaṃ sūcīgṛhakaṃ melaṃdukaṃ ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.440_0: / gacchet tadrūpeṣu pratyayeṣu prativihāre sāv upadrave vyapadiśya /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.465_0: / tathāgatapā[rśva]deśavaivṛttatā cet tasyāṃ diśi karaṇaṃ yatraiṣāṃ
V03vinsutru:vin_17.489_0: / na kaṇṭakānāṃ ropa[ṇa]ṃ nāgadantakānāṃ māsasaṃyojanāya dānam uttiṣṭhati /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.491_0: / noparidīpadānaṃ āgārikaiṣpūjanārtham adhirohaṇam abhāve śramaṇodd[e]śaiṣpādo prakṣālya gandhodakena /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.492_0: / na ced anena gandhair udvartya vastreṇa vā veṣṭayitvā śāstu saṃjñāmāmukhīkṛtyārtham abhidhyāya smṛtaiḥ /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.502_0: / [65a1] // navakeṣv asya prāptiḥ paṃcabhiḥ nikāyaiḥ parivāradānaṃ /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.504_0: / vāditreṇaitadvādyamānena sār[d]vanyena ca mahatā sa[t]kāreṇa nirāvadyaṃ vādanāya kuru kuru bhoṣ puruṣa [śāstu]ḥ pūjām ity udīraṇam* /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.505_0_0: / udghoṣaṇaṃ rathyāvīthica[phva?] sṛṅgāṭakeṣu śvaḥ paraśvo vā bhaviṣyattāyāṃ likhitasya iti buddhapraveśo bhaviṣyatīti bhujādāvāropitasya
V03vinsutru:vin_17.507_0: / dhvajair asyāḥ parivāro vedikayāveṣṭanam* lohastambheś ca /
V03vinsutru:vin_17.521_0: / samāptāyāṃ pūjāyāṃ nirvṛteṣu vādyeṣu viprakrānte janakāye maṇḍanāpanamanam* /
V03vinsutru:348_1: dhāraṇaṃ vipravāsaṃ ca sparśam agner nivārite /
V03vinsutru:348_2: bhojanaṃ bījāghātaṃ ca deśe ca harite śuciḥ //
V03vinsutru:348_3: utsargaṃ vṛkṣārohaś ca śaikṣā u[65a5]ddeśāyos saha /
V03vinsutru:348_7: ityādy asyāntabhāg liṅga yāñcā bhāṇḍopabhugdrava kāmopabhoga saṃvāsānād
V03vinsutru:348_12: vidhāraṇaṃ saptakaṃ dve cānye dhāraṇādhiṣṭhānoddhārānuddhāra iti //
V03vinsutru:348_14: hitvānuddhṛto cānuśāṭī ca dvādaśaparṣya nalaṣaṭkaṃ cīvaraṃ
V03vinsutru:348_17: [65b1] jatvaṅgulitalaromachannau ca karṇakagrahaṇe bhikṣoś ca vidyāpāṭhanamocana
V03vinsutru:348_19: gṛhe channe layane mañce udvarttanamaṃcaka unmuroṭikā gandhapiṇyākataḥ /
V03vinsutru:348_21: chatropānaha āsandī niṣādārikarttanaṃ coḍā // vikrayagṛhapaticyutvā lasuna
V03vinsutru:348_28: jñapanaṃ sekavākyañ ca satyavākyañ ca tadyathā /
V03vinsutru:348_47: sīmnaḥ sāmragra dānaṃ ca poṣadhasya ca saptakaṃ //
V03vinsutru:348_53: śākyabhikṣu dharmakīrttinā sattvārthe likhitaṃ śrīmad vikramaśilām āśritya
V03vinsutru:348_55: gnur chos kyi grags pas bris pa / dpal ldan 'vyri krama śi lar dpye 'sla ra va la
V03vinsutru:348_58: śī la a ka ra sa bris pa (= śīlākaraṇe likhitam)
V03vinsutru:348_60: gnur dha rma kir tis bris pa jo ca myiṅi mkhan vuyin /
V03vinsutru:348_61: etasya dharmakīrtter vaṇanaṃ debler sro po granthe /
